q1: Why is Uruguay so bad each World Cup
a1: I think they sometimes get unlucky with the draws.
q2: Considering they eliminated the European champions and lost to the eventual World Cup champions, I don't think they were bad.
q3: In what way were they bad?
a3: At least Suarez didn't bite anyone this time.
q4: Uruguay played a respectable world cup, even though everyone had higher expectations for them.
a4: I don't think many people had high expectations.
q5: I had high expectations, what did they do to lower yours?
a5: They barely were able to hold off a weak Portugal side and didn't look challenging enough against France.
